template.name: windows_general
template.description: 主要监控windows的硬件：CPU，内存，硬盘IO及读写，网卡自动发现，服务自动发现 不需脚本支持，适合大部分windows系统 制作人：王斌 制作时间：2020年05月12日 目前版本为:v0.1

item.name: Average disk read queue length
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Read Queue Length

item.name: Average disk write queue length
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk write Queue Length

item.name: total swap disk space
item.description: 总共有多少容量硬盘交换空间

discovery_rule.name: service_discovery
discovery_rule.description: windows服务器上的服务自动发现

discovery_rule.name: filesystem_discovery
discovery_rule.description: discovery of file systems of different types as defind in global regular expression "file systems for discovery"

trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than 20% on volume {#FSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: 硬盘空闲率低于20%就告警

trigger_prototype.name: used disk space is less than 80% on volume {#FSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: 硬盘使用率高于80%就告警

trigger.name: swap space pused more than 90% on server on {HOST.NAME}
